title: Definitions
context: [ยง662D-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context requires otherwise: &ldquo;Governmental entity&rdquo; means any agency, association, authority, board, commission, division, office, officer, public body, task force, or any other similar entity authorized or established by any county or the State. &ldquo;Nonprofit corporation&rdquo; means any corporation that is exempt from taxation pursuant to section 501(a) of the Internal Revenue Code, 26 U.S.C. section 501(a). &ldquo;Nonprofit organization&rdquo; means any organization that is exempt from taxation pursuant to section 501&copy; of the Internal Revenue Code, 26 U.S.C. section 501&copy;, as amended. &ldquo;Volunteer&rdquo; means a person performing services without compensation, other than reimbursement for actual expenses incurred, for a nonprofit organization, a nonprofit corporation, a hospital, or a governmental entity. The term includes a volunteer serving as a director, officer, trustee, member, or direct service volunteer. [L 1997, c 351, pt of ยง2]
